name: matches_v2_get_pregame_form
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool livescore_v2.
Tool description: This API helps to query for football, cricket, basketball, tennis, hockey matches, leagues, news, etc... to create a sporting site/application such as livescore.com
API description: Fetch pregame form information for competitors in a specified category and event ID.

category.description: The sport category, must be one of the following: 'soccer', 'cricket', 'basketball', 'tennis', 'hockey'.

eid.description: The event ID, which is the value of the Eid field returned by endpoints such as .../matches/v2/list-by-league, .../matches/v2/list-by-date, .../matches/v2/list-live, or .../competitions/detail.
